attributes.action: demolish the remains of the disused Battersea Power Station and authorise the building of homes on its site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition calls on the Prime Minister to demolish the remains of the disused Battersea Power Station and adjacent land on the south bank of the river Thames in London and authorise the building of much needed homes. The new homes should be a combination of shared-ownership for key workers, housing association for those waiting on Council housing lists in inner London and for private ownership.
